messages.content: You are a smart home assistant and NuCore expert.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: NuCore Smart Thermostat
  ***Properties***
    Current Temperature
      Range 10.0 to 30.0 Unit °C
    Target Temperature
      Range 10.0 to 30.0 Unit °C
    Mode
      Enum
        Off [0]
        Heat [1]
        Cool [2]
        Auto [3]
    Fan Speed
      Enum
        Low [0]
        Medium [1]
        High [2]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Set Temperature [SET_TEMP]
      Parameter 1: []
        Range 10.0 to 30.0 Unit °C
    Set Mode [SET_MODE]
      Parameter 1: []
        Enum
          Off [0]
          Heat [1]
          Cool [2]
          Auto [3]
    Set Fan Speed [SET_FAN]
      Parameter 1: []
        Enum
          Low [0]
          Medium [1]
          High [2]
    Query Status [QUERY]
  ***Send Commands***
    Report Temperature [RPT_TEMP]
    Report Mode [RPT_MODE]
    Report Fan Speed [RPT_FAN]

USER QUERY:
Can you set the thermostat to 22.5 degrees Celsius and switch it to heat mode?

First, I review the device properties and commands. The thermostat accepts a Set Temperature command with a parameter between 10.0 and 30.0 °C, and a Set Mode command with enumerated values including Heat. The requested temperature 22.5 °C is within the allowed range. The mode 'Heat' corresponds to enum value [1].

To fulfill the request, I will issue Set Temperature with 22.5 °C and Set Mode with Heat.

Result: Execute Set Temperature(22.5 °C) and Set Mode(Heat) to set the thermostat accordingly.
You are a smart home assistant and NuCore expert.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: NuCore Smart Light Panel
  ***Properties***
    Status
      Range 0 to 100 Unit %
        Off [0]
    Color Temperature
      Range 2700 to 6500 Unit K
    Brightness
      Range 0 to 100 Unit %
  ***Accept Commands***
    On [DON]
      Parameter 1: []
        Range 0 to 100 Unit %
    Off [DOF]
    Set Brightness [BRT]
      Parameter 1: []
        Range 0 to 100 Unit %
    Set Color Temperature [SET_CT]
      Parameter 1: []
        Range 2700 to 6500 Unit K
    Query Status [QUERY]
  ***Send Commands***
    On [DON]
    Off [DOF]
    Brighten [BRT]
    Dim [DIM]

USER QUERY:
I want to turn on the light panel at 75% brightness and set the color temperature to 4000 Kelvin.

I analyze the device structure: the light panel can be turned on with a parameter from 0 to 100% brightness. It also accepts a Set Color Temperature command with a range from 2700 to 6500 K.

The user wants the light on at 75% brightness, which is within the allowed range, and color temperature set to 4000 K, also valid.

Therefore, I will first send the On command with parameter 75%, then issue Set Color Temperature with 4000 K.

Result: Send On(75%) and Set Color Temperature(4000 K) commands to achieve the desired lighting.
You are a smart home assistant and NuCore expert.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: NuCore Smart Ceiling Fan
  ***Properties***
    Power Status
      Enum
        Off [0]
        On [1]
    Speed Level
      Range 0 to 3 Unit level
        Off [0]
        Low [1]
        Medium [2]
        High [3]
    Oscillation
      Enum
        Disabled [0]
        Enabled [1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Turn On [ON]
    Turn Off [OFF]
    Set Speed [SET_SPEED]
      Parameter 1: []
        Range 0 to 3 Unit level
    Enable Oscillation [OSC_ON]
    Disable Oscillation [OSC_OFF]
    Query Status [QUERY]
  ***Send Commands***
    Report Speed [RPT_SPEED]
    Report Oscillation [RPT_OSC]

USER QUERY:
Please turn on the ceiling fan, set speed to medium, and enable oscillation.

Reviewing the device structure, the ceiling fan accepts Turn On and Turn Off commands, and Set Speed with a parameter from 0 (Off) to 3 (High). Medium speed corresponds to 2. Oscillation can be enabled or disabled via dedicated commands.

The user wants the fan turned on, speed set to medium (2), and oscillation enabled.

Step 1: Send Turn On command.
Step 2: Send Set Speed with parameter 2.
Step 3: Send Enable Oscillation command.

Result: Execute Turn On, Set Speed(2), and Enable Oscillation to meet the user's request.
You are a smart home assistant and NuCore expert.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: NuCore Smart Energy Meter
  ***Properties***
    Current Power Usage
      Range 0.0 to 5000.0 Unit W
    Total Energy Consumed
      Range 0.0 to 10000.0 Unit kWh
    Voltage
      Range 100 to 240 Unit V
  ***Accept Commands***
    Reset Energy Counter [RESET]
    Query Power Usage [QUERY_PWR]
    Query Energy Consumed [QUERY_ENERGY]
    Query Voltage [QUERY_VOLT]
  ***Send Commands***
    Report Power Usage [RPT_PWR]
    Report Energy Consumed [RPT_ENERGY]
    Report Voltage [RPT_VOLT]

USER QUERY:
What is the current power usage and voltage of the energy meter? Also, reset the total energy consumed counter.

The device properties include Current Power Usage (0 to 5000 W) and Voltage (100 to 240 V). The device accepts commands to query power usage, energy consumed, and voltage, as well as to reset the energy counter.

To answer the user's query, I will first issue Query Power Usage and Query Voltage commands to retrieve current values. Then, to reset the total energy consumed counter, I will send the Reset Energy Counter command.

Result: Send Query Power Usage and Query Voltage commands to get current readings, then send Reset Energy Counter to reset the total energy consumed.
You are a smart home assistant and NuCore expert.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: NuCore Smart Window Shade
  ***Properties***
    Position
      Range 0 to 100 Unit %
        Fully Closed [0]
        Fully Open [100]
    Tilt Angle
      Range -90 to 90 Unit degrees
    Status
      Enum
        Stopped [0]
        Moving [1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Open Shade [OPEN]
    Close Shade [CLOSE]
    Set Position [SET_POS]
      Parameter 1: []
        Range 0 to 100 Unit %
    Set Tilt [SET_TILT]
      Parameter 1: []
        Range -90 to 90 Unit degrees
    Stop Movement [STOP]
    Query Status [QUERY]
  ***Send Commands***
    Report Position [RPT_POS]
    Report Tilt [RPT_TILT]

USER QUERY:
Could you set the window shade to 60% open and tilt the slats to 15 degrees?

The device properties show Position from 0% (fully closed) to 100% (fully open), and Tilt Angle from -90 to 90 degrees. The device accepts Set Position and Set Tilt commands with these ranges.

The user requests setting the shade to 60% open and tilt slats to 15 degrees, both within valid ranges.

Therefore, I will send Set Position with 60% and Set Tilt with 15 degrees.

Result: Execute Set Position(60%) and Set Tilt(15°) to adjust the window shade as requested.
You are a smart home assistant and NuCore expert.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: NuCore Smart Door Lock
  ***Properties***
    Lock Status
      Enum
        Locked [0]
        Unlocked [1]
    Battery Level
      Range 0 to 100 Unit %
  ***Accept Commands***
    Lock Door [LOCK]
    Unlock Door [UNLOCK]
    Query Status [QUERY]
  ***Send Commands***
    Report Lock Status [RPT_LOCK]
    Report Battery Level [RPT_BATT]

USER QUERY:
Is the door locked right now? Also, what is the battery level?

The device has Lock Status property with values Locked or Unlocked, and Battery Level from 0 to 100%. It accepts Query Status command to retrieve current states.

To answer, I will send Query Status to get the lock status and battery level.

Result: Send Query Status command, then report whether the door is locked and the current battery level percentage.
You are a smart home assistant and NuCore expert.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: NuCore Smart Irrigation Controller
  ***Properties***
    Watering Duration
      Range 1 to 120 Unit minutes
    Zone Status
      Enum
        Off [0]
        On [1]
    Schedule Enabled
      Enum
        Disabled [0]
        Enabled [1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Start Watering [START]
      Parameter 1: []
        Range 1 to 120 Unit minutes
    Stop Watering [STOP]
    Enable Schedule [ENABLE_SCH]
    Disable Schedule [DISABLE_SCH]
    Query Status [QUERY]
  ***Send Commands***
    Report Zone Status [RPT_ZONE]
    Report Schedule Status [RPT_SCH]

USER QUERY:
Please start watering zone for 30 minutes and enable the schedule.

The device accepts Start Watering command with a duration parameter from 1 to 120 minutes, and commands to enable or disable the schedule.

The user wants to start watering for 30 minutes and enable the schedule, both valid requests.

I will send Start Watering with 30 minutes and Enable Schedule commands.

Result: Execute Start Watering(30 minutes) and Enable Schedule to fulfill the request.
You are a smart home assistant and NuCore expert.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: NuCore Smart Garage Door Opener
  ***Properties***
    Door Position
      Range 0 to 100 Unit %
        Closed [0]
        Open [100]
    Status
      Enum
        Stopped [0]
        Opening [1]
        Closing [2]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Open Door [OPEN]
    Close Door [CLOSE]
    Stop Door [STOP]
    Set Position [SET_POS]
      Parameter 1: []
        Range 0 to 100 Unit %
    Query Status [QUERY]
  ***Send Commands***
    Report Position [RPT_POS]
    Report Status [RPT_STATUS]

USER QUERY:
Can you partially open the garage door to 40% and then stop it?

The device supports setting the door position from 0% (closed) to 100% (open) and has a Stop command.

The user wants to open the door to 40%, which is within the valid range, and then stop the door.

I will send Set Position with 40%, then send Stop command to halt movement.

Result: Execute Set Position(40%) followed by Stop to partially open and then stop the garage door.
You are a smart home assistant and NuCore expert.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: NuCore Smart Audio System
  ***Properties***
    Volume Level
      Range 0 to 100 Unit %
    Mute Status
      Enum
        Muted [0]
        Unmuted [1]
    Input Source
      Enum
        Bluetooth [0]
        AUX [1]
        Optical [2]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Set Volume [SET_VOL]
      Parameter 1: []
        Range 0 to 100 Unit %
    Mute [MUTE]
    Unmute [UNMUTE]
    Set Input Source [SET_SRC]
      Parameter 1: []
        Enum
          Bluetooth [0]
          AUX [1]
          Optical [2]
    Query Status [QUERY]
  ***Send Commands***
    Report Volume [RPT_VOL]
    Report Mute Status [RPT_MUTE]
    Report Input Source [RPT_SRC]

USER QUERY:
Please set the volume to 65%, mute the audio, and switch input to AUX.

The device accepts Set Volume with a parameter from 0 to 100%, Mute and Unmute commands, and Set Input Source with enumerated values Bluetooth, AUX, and Optical.

The user wants volume at 65%, mute enabled, and input source set to AUX.

I will send Set Volume(65%), Mute, and Set Input Source(AUX) commands.

Result: Execute Set Volume(65%), Mute, and Set Input Source(AUX) to meet the user's request.
